question: Julie has always struggled to line up their shots, so they take a spare club, and lie it down on the ground so that they can line their feet up with it before taking their shot. Is this allowed?*

choices.text: No, they will get a two-stroke penalty. You are not allowed to place aids on the ground to help you line up your shot.
Yes, it's what you do when you are practicing, so you can do it on a golf course

explanation: Unfortunately, Julie will get a two-stroke penalty. You cannot place something down on the ground to help with your alignment.
